short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate money to the specific currency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to quickly convert the money into another currency.
It automatically detects the currency and amount from the currently selected text.

Supported currencies:
- USD
- AUD
- GBP
- CAD
- EUR
- JPY
